website_summaries.verdict: The dried flower is a beautiful addition to any shelf or counter top in your home.
pros: Choose from a wide range of scents
Includes 5 reed sticks as well as a stylish dried flower
Flower color differs based on the scent you choose
Diffuser sits at a surprisingly low price point
cons: Many found the lavender scent to be unnatural

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product! Perfect Diffuser! Beautiful and Great Smell.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful reed and flower diffuser. Perfect packaging with lots of oil in it. I purchased a real flower diffuser with April Fresh scent. I absolutely love it. This is a pretty modern diffuser; good for my home decor. I am going to re-purchase it for every room in my house and gift for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This looks so cute and smells sooo good! I smell it as soon as I walk into my bathroom. I hope it last for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: That Classy and amazing scent you gotta have!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! First of all, it’s bigger than it looks which was a pleasant surprise. The other infuser I had was really small so I am really happy. It looks fancy and makes my apartment smell amazing. I put it in my bedroom but the scent travels to my living room and hallway ( and I have a large apartment). I am already putting in an order for a second one to put in the other side of my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who comes into my office comments on how nice it smells in there! I let them know it’s my diffuser. I love the looks of it with the bright flowers as well. The only thing I don’t like is that it’s was empty faster than I expected. Other diffusers that I have gotten from pier one for example have lasted a lot longer for the money. Other wise I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty and elegant. I bought the peony scent which was ok, but scent is very subjective so everyone is different. I like this diffuser a lot and planning to buy more. Just wish the price can be cheaper. I’m planning to make my own diffuser oil once the oil runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Bought two on a lightening deal and so happy I did ! I’ve tried countless brands and most don’t work well. I tried switching out saturated reeds in hopes of most working and nothing. First, these really do put out a beautiful scent. Second, they are affordable and third is that they are appealing to the eye. Finally , found a brand other than having to go to Y. Candle and spend a fortune !
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m SO glad I bought this. The scent is perfect for a small room or office. It looks great on my desk and the refills and very affordable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bex Terefe

customer_reviews.title: Smells so gooood.
customer_reviews.text: This smells like clean laundry!. The size of the bottle you get is the same size you get from Jo Malone. This scent is perfect! Gonna' order another one for my upstairs bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Miyake A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty! However...
customer_reviews.text: Bottle and presentation was very nice! However the scent did not smell like roses nor was it very strong. But for price I'll keep it and replace oil with another one in time. Depending on how long until i feel it is useless..
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is super pretty! I wish they had a vanilla or coconut scent. The april fresh scent is nice, I'm just very into vanilla or coconut as a home fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Damaging to your lungs/throat
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to say, I ended up throwing most of the content into my toilet bowl. Having it around my house made me cough like crazy, and although I tried to live in denial for a week or so, I knew that it was the only thing that changed. And of course, as soon as the flavored oil was down the drain, my cough stopped. I honestly don't think that whatever they have in the oil is good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 Very Different Presentations
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even sure how to rate this item. I ordered two: one Floral Bouquet" with the rose and one "Refreshing Air" with the rose. Shipped and received in the same box. See pics. Refreshing Air: you're the stepchild no one loves apparently! I bought these as gifts for co-workers but I can't even give the second one to someone I hate and feel ok about it!
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good value for money. The fragrance is beautiful - no matter which one you buy. The appearance is lovely - I have it in my lounge at home. They last a long time - I have been using it for over two weeks now and there is still a great deal of liquid in the bottle. The fragrance is not overpowering but you can smell it as soon as you walk into the room that it has been placed in - which I like very much. I would, and have, bought this product again.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the guest bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I really paid attention to the reviews here on this one and it paid off! There were complaints about the flowers so I bought a simple very small bundle of babies breath just in case I needed it and I did. The flowers are awful. I am absolutely satisfied with the purchase BUT without buying that babies breath I wouldn't be! The scent is amazing! Tip for those that are using this in a space that doesn't get used often. Leave your reeds soaking and don't flip them until you're having guests (or whatever you need it for). That way your oil should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lovely presentation
customer_reviews.text: This reed diffuser arrived in lovely packaging. It was simple to put together and was very attractive After putting it together, I patiently waited for the aroma of the Garden Lavender. To my dismay, the aroma was almost nonexistent. After two days, the aroma was still almost nonexistent. I tried reversing the reeds in the liquid and still no better. I am disappointed. I have decided to purchase a lavender essential oil locally for use with this diffuser. The dried flowers are lovely. Thank you for reading my review.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Love LOVE Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim while it was on a lightening deal. Boy am I glad I did I purchased the 6.7 oz. Signature of the Floral Bouquet. I love it. The bottle is a a very pretty thick clear glass and mine came with the standard black reeds. It simple yet very elegant. The fragrance is amazing. It smells just like the inside of a floral shop, but not overwhelming. I liked it so much I ordered a second for my office. I DEFINITELY reccomend this. It's a great little gift for birthdays or a simple thank you gift.
customer_reviews.author: kilby123

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that this reed diffuser is strong enough that you can actually smell it. The bad news is that I didn't care much for this scent, and it does not look like the picture. It smells like inexpensive bar soap. Although the dried flowers are pretty, there are about half the number of flowers that you see in the image. I would try another scent next time, but, I feel cheated with the few number of flowers as compared to what I thought I was getting. I probably won't reorder from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck smell. Reviews bundle all scents
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th vase I purchased from this company. The scent is pear or something and I don’t like at all. I have the lavender, rose & linen. But this pear scent is so unappealing. I tried to get some other scents, this one is Amazon limited choices without paying $30 shipping so I fell for it. The other scents are lovely. Ripped off on this with reviews all bundled into on product vs each scent. One of the things I can’t trust about amazon even though I buy almost all things from them. And the return policy and pick up has gone downhill. Still love my Prime. Always some clunker gets in there.
customer_reviews.author: arose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but smells too sweet
customer_reviews.text: It's very beautiful and I just love its look so much. However, the scent was way too sweet for my taste and smells cheap. I put it on my desk at first but soon I couldn't bear the smell so I moved it far away to avoid the smell but still enjoy the display. The bottle & flowers are so pretty I think I'll go find some other oil to refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful. Very strong, fake lavender smell, and started giving me a headache. I pitched it. The product description on Amazon made it sound safe to me, but the back of the box made me think otherwise. It's saying to keep product in a well ventilated area for your health. Gross. I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something to think about before buying...
customer_reviews.text: I got the fresh cotton smell for my husband’s office because I figured it wasn’t so girly smelling. The scent was really too overpowering for his small office space and the liquid turned blue from the blue dye in the flowers. It still is a pretty presentation despite the blue Kool-aid looking liquid. I probably will not be getting this in the future for his particular space.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: So the packaging of this product is very nice. The container itself is thick glass, the sticks are a sturdy wood and the dried flowers are very pretty. The over all look of the product is very good, BUT the smell is terrible. I got the rose scent because I love that smell. This smells nothing like Rose's, it's a sickly sweet gross smell and very strong. Very disappointed with this project
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a diffuser that would actually work in its longevity and enhance my home. Thought these might have worked based off the reviews but they were misleading. The overall look when I received the product was appealing and I was happy with that in itself. Just the lasting scent is my biggest issue with the diffuser! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Estrella White

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly weak scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black cherry fragrance, inserting all of the sticks and flowered leaf into the jar. After a few days, the aroma is so very weak, I can only vaguely smell it when I walk into the room, but it's nothing that makes me go, "Wow, that is delicious!" The room I have it in is a very small bedroom, which is why I'm so disappointed. I wouldn't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Weak scent...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, packaged good, doesn't smell strong enough. The scent is pleasant when your "all up in it", but that's it. I have it in my bathroom and I can't smell anything compared to competitions scent.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Frangrance is negligible and product evaporated quickly
customer_reviews.text: The scent is nonexistent and the product doesn’t last very long. I opened them for the first time and from the beginning there was very little fragrance. Also, they have not been opened very long, maybe a few weeks and they’re almost gone. I’ve never had a reed diffuser evaporate in less than a month. The container is nice looking. That’s the only time it has going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at, difficult to smell
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flowers along with the bamboo sticks. The scent was not strong at all, even in a very small powder room I don’t smell it when I first go in. But I really like it for its looks. And I will fill it with other stronger scents.
customer_reviews.author: Kris C Cal

customer_reviews.title: Good that there are 2 of them in a pack
customer_reviews.text: Good that there are 2 of them in a pack, but I wish it would be more different kinds like that in a pack. It spreads well and my bathroom really does have a nice smell, but overall I feel like because of that this diffuser doesn't like too long. It is still good and I'm keep buying it as it is best one in terms of price, I just wish it would last a bit longer...
customer_reviews.author: Dasha

customer_reviews.title: It's a really great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! The scent and the quality is really awesome!! It lasts a long time and it's definitely not a cheap brand. I'm buying more to give as gifts!! It's a MUST buy for the quality and the price! My room smells really good thanks to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sksmsk7

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation, awful smell.
customer_reviews.text: The dried flowers and container itself are perfect. The scent is not good. Very strong and does not smell like peony. Will most likely use the container and dump the scent it came with and make my own.
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Very aromatic
customer_reviews.text: Super potent smell. Lasts a while. Cute presentation. I love the grip pad that it comes with. I don't have to worry about putting it on top of my toilet pump cover and it potentially falling. Neat idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sumiko Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: This smells awful. Unfortunately we opened it and removed the seal so I cannot return it. This smells like nasty chemicals- Cannot seem to rid our house of the odor even after throwing it away. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO FREAKING REGRETS. JUST BUY THIS PRODUCT. YOULL OBSESSED LIKE ME
customer_reviews.text: I am onto my third order of this crazy superbly amazing product! I LOVE LOVE LOVE this purchase!! It is simply the BEST diffuser ever! I’m a big fan of perfume so this was a must buy for my office! So lucky to have found this company on Amazon!! I am so obsessed with Cocod’or!!! Amazing scent, diffuses quickly, comes in an insanely pretty packaging, and one order lasted for more than two months! You can even buy refills! Can’t wait to try the other scents! I highly recommend 100/10!!! Love it so much! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Guila Roales

customer_reviews.title: Good design but no scent...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my living room and bathroom. They are really pretty but doesn't serve the purpose of providing scent. I used 4 to 3 to 2, and when I come into the room, I just don't smell this scent. The only way to smell is to go really close to this diffuser. It's shame... I wanted to buy more if it worked. The scent is okay - laundry scentish. The bottle and design look luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: GYC

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 different scents and they were both great. The scent is not over powering but definitely noticable. The only downside is, they don't last very long. Probably around 3 weeks or so and the oil will run dry. Looks very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Cute, smells good, but the dye runs
customer_reviews.text: Smells great looks pretty, keep in mind the pink dye from the baby's breath did seep into the liquid and dyed it pink. Might be a good idea to get a white one if that's a concern. Though the baby's breath didnt seem to lose any color itself. The scent/liquid seemed to dissipate relatively faster than what I expected. About 1/3 was gone after about a month, but then again the opening is relatively large.
customer_reviews.author: Theluckykind

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reed diffuser that looked nice and this one really is! The scent is very powerful, especially for a small room like a bathroom or bedroom. I prefer a lighter, more subtle scent. The pure cotton sounded like the lightest option but it is still pretty strong and in your face.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Smell fades and the oil gets diffused quickly
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice smell like fresh laundry. The smell does seem to fade after a short time and the actual scented oil in the jar goes very quickly compared to any other reed diffusers I have in my home. I generally buy reed diffusers for the longevity of them so it’s a bit of a disappointment considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: jane.dough

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got the black cherry scent. It did come off as a candy smell initially but within a few hours in my bedroom it really spreads out nicely. I’ll probably buy a refill but now I am curious to try the other scents because the display is so damn cute.
customer_reviews.author: Teigh 🥡

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and lifts up the room
customer_reviews.text: I have it in my living room and the scent is so nice. Not super sweet or fruity. Almost like a cherry tart. Not overbearing either. It didn't last as long as I thought it should but the regular are pretty cheap. The flowers definitely bring it up a notch for display. Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.author: She Sparkled

customer_reviews.title: FAKE ROSE, POOR PACKAGING.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon shipped this item in a padded envelope. A piece of glass (dropper?) was broken inside upon opening the package. The small blue flowers were real and smelt beautiful. The bottle holding the scent is strong and durable but that’s no excuse to ship this in a padded envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Fayelle

customer_reviews.title: Sweet accent & nice fragrance
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very nice and subtle. Longevity I rated 4 since I’ve only had for a few days. The shipping package created dents in product box. However actual product was undamaged thankfully due to the interior packaging. Like the added small flowers in addition to the ‘sticks’ - nicer aesthetically
customer_reviews.author: CelticKirk

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent originally, but as it filled my small apartment it became sickening. I also started sneezing incessantly and my eyes itched horribly. I finally put the diffuser outside just to see if it was the culprit and sure enough, my symptoms cleared within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: M Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted this diffuser is not only beautiful but it smells Amazing... I've gotten so many complements on it asking where I got it . I will definantly be ordering more as I want to give these out as gifts .My whole room smells like fresh roses I couldn't be more happy with this product and I think your going to love it as well .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like Peony!
customer_reviews.text: Evaporates Quickly. Was pulled in by additional flowers, which are different and attractive. Scent is not representative of peony at all. Spilled oil on fingernails and it took of nail polish. Not sure of ingredients but does not seem as though comprised of essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird, looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love the little Rose and flowers it comes with but I don't really like the smell. It doesn't smell like roses but instead it's very powdery. I will buy another oil and replace it but keep the bottle and flowers because it's so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael&Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, these are okay. The presentation is good and the look really nice. However, I dont get much of the scent from them. This could just be the reeds or the oil, so at some point I will try something different I think. Other than that, they serve there purpose, and do look nice. Certainly not for bigger rooms though. We have them in the bathrooms
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ryan Huseman

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! Perfect size and the scent is wonderful! Will definitely order again ! Placed one in my living room but replaced the “ sticks” with orange ones because that is the accent color in my living room ... the other in my bathroom and smells like fresh flowers every time I go in there !
customer_reviews.author: Linda McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful presentation and the scent fills the whole bathroom. Perfect for spa nights. Only thing I wasn't expecting was how fast the oil evaporated, even without flipping the sticks. It's been about a month and you can see in the photo how much has evaporated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: The April fresh scent is a cotton clean scent and I think would be great for a bedroom or laundry room. It is very pretty with the real flowers as well! I am very pleased. I just got it today so cannot comment on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: krrice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two next day delivery it has my home smelling wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Service great but smell questionable
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with how quickly I received my order and how well it was packaged. Thank you. However, I am quite disappointed in the scent. I absolutely love peony’s but this smell is hard to describe other than to say it is almost medicinal. I opened it and set it out. At first it didn’t seem like it was doing anything. About an hour later, I found myself searching for the cause of the smell. It wasn’t very pleasant. I think the product works well as far as dispersing but wow it isn’t peony to me. Sorry to disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Marcedes Hayunga

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance longevity
customer_reviews.text: I have been really liking cocodor and have ordered it a few times now. It has a long-lasting fragrance in an average enclosed space, I have it in all my house bedrooms and it smells amazing all day. A drawback is if it is a big space like living room or master room you're going to need to put two of them. Like how it comes with mini decorated flowers to keep inside the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dhruval Patel

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Ahmazinggg ! Wonderful scent and beautiful as well. Oil evaporates quickly. Tip: To prolong the use of this diffuser , take out the reeds and put the stopper back in the bottle to prevent the oil from evaporating. The scent from the reeds will continue to give fragrance for at least a week !
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom. It smells pretty good, similar to any other cotton smell. The reeds and flowers though really make it beautiful. I get migranes so strong smells, and at one point it triggered a headache for alittle so, yes it doesn't work, haha. We had it placed in a small hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect Pretty Fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the purchase! I love the smell! Reminds me of spring and blooms of peony! I smell it as soon as I walk past my deck room. It’s so lovely. The oil is enough to last a while, it’s very cute and the presentation is pretty. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Withadashofmoon

customer_reviews.title: Scent is AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of lavender essential oils. This is marketed as lavender, and it's beautiful... but the smell was horrendous - nothing like lavender. After about 1/2 an hour, I packaged it back up, and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rulon

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did everything as written in the description. I have a small bathroom. It barely fits one person. It's been sitting there and the only thing I've noticed is that the liquid is going down. You won't smell anything until you get a couple of inches away from it. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sadam

customer_reviews.title: Was sent incorrect flowers and scent
customer_reviews.text: Good scent, but didn't seem to be as strong after the first few days despite flipping over the reeds as directed. Unfortunately, I got sent the wrong color and scent, which didn't go with my bathroom decor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: No lovely essence of beach cherries
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my small bathroom for 5 days and I can’t smell anything. There is nothing emitting from the sticks and I have all 5 sticks in. I have tried flipping them and still nothing. I replaced this with another product and the difference was noticeable from the next room. I asked for a replacement but my only option is a return. Unfortunately I threw away the cover when I opened it, not anticipating that there would be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Garrison

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! It’s adorable on a shelf in my half bathroom. The Fresh Air scent is really nice, and the presentation is beautiful. It comes in a nice box so it would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This is big for the money. Smells amazing but not over plowing but can make a room smell nice. I will definitely be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi W.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly.
customer_reviews.text: There’s a little glass tube I assumed was for the flowers. I put water in it. The water turned red in a day I assume from the dye. So don’t put the flowers in the oil Very smelly pleasing to my nose
customer_reviews.author: Codoje

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I thought it was so much more beautiful than a regular reed diffuser. The flowers add a really nice touch. The "refreshing air" scent smells exactly like that. Love having these all over my house!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bottle, but the scent not good
customer_reviews.text: such a cute beautiful bottle, but the scent made me nauseous, maybe I got the wrong one, who knows. But I'll be returning it. Presentation is beautiful and delivery was quick
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on a small shelf in bathroom. The smell is amazing and strong the first few days, maybe a week. It been 3 weeks now and I can’t really smell it anymore. That’s a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: karen dupske

customer_reviews.title: Best diffuser! Great decorative item!
customer_reviews.text: I love these diffusers! This scent is amazing and long lasting and the design is so pretty that it works as a decoration item and diffuser! This makes my entire room smell amazing and I get so many compliments on the scent. Get this diffuser for every room!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anum

customer_reviews.title: strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically this is really very pretty. I purchased the Lovely Peony. I have grown peonies and they have a wonderful and distinct sweet smell, this smells nothing like a peony. This smells like grandmas bad perfume from the 70's with a bitter chemical smell. I would not purchase this fragrance again but I would give another fragrance a try just because of the aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Matcham

customer_reviews.title: I love the display it adds classy touch
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just received it and setup in my bathroom sink counter. It’s larger than I thought it would be and pleasantly surprised the oil is filled to the top. At first whiff the scent is interesting but I have to wait a couple days to fully tell. Presentation wise I love the setup! What you see is exactly what you get...I may update on longevity and the April Fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lascelles

customer_reviews.title: Love the bottle, flowers and reeds but not the scent.
customer_reviews.text: I am still glad I purchased it because I can still fill it with another scent and just buy new reeds. Problem solved. It looks great in my spa like bathroom. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Subtle scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is very subtle and gently sweet. The jar is pretty and looks nice on the counter. Contemporary look and the little flowers are a nice addition. Guests comment on how pretty it is. I like the dark reeds. This sits in a small bathroom. Scent probably would t be noticed in a large room
customer_reviews.author: Louise A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Quickly scent gone
customer_reviews.text: I have put it for more than three weeks. I am not able to smell its scent any more. The scent is gone too quickly. Good for decoration, not good for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Seo

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good scent
customer_reviews.text: I built a shelf for my bathroom and wasn’t able to use a candle and this is great. The scent isn’t completely overpowering but it definitely gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Matt Giorgianni

customer_reviews.title: It was good
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting April to have such rustic old fashioned smell. But I do like the product. Want to buy a diff sent next time.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love my diffuser. I got one The scent lasts all day and it smells amazing. The only thing I noticed was that the reeds sucked up the oil very fast, so I have to purchase the refill oil soon.
customer_reviews.author: Annette  Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and it’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my half bath, next to my air return. This thing makes the whole house smell good. It is very beautiful, the pic doesn’t lie. I love it and will order more of varying scents for throughout my house.
customer_reviews.author: LizZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice, will last 3 mn
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in December for a guest bathroom. Now, in February this is almost empty, but it gives a bit of scent. The scent and presentation are very nice. You decide if you are ok with 3 mn useful life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be so much smaller, but was pleasantly surprised. It smells so good and the scented oil seems to be long lasting. Very pretty as well. I would recommend to anyone, my husband even loves the smell and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Portalatin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price. Very pretty and smells really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a nice box. Contents was bigger than I expected which is a plus. The fragrance is nice and mild and not overbearing. It looks very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Smells just about right, not overpowering, and looks so beautiful. It was securely packaged but a little bit shaken up during shipping so I opened the box and rearranged things inside. It’s gonna be a great gift because it looks so beautiful and the price is great. I was gonna gift this but might keep it for myself...
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any scent
customer_reviews.text: The flower and reed diffuser itself is an attractive piece but there is barely any scent at all. I got the "lovely peony" scent and what little fragrance it gives off isn't all that appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Looks and smells very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute to look at and smells really good. I bought it for my cubicle but eventually you can smell it in the entire office. Everyone walked in saying it smelled nice. Will buy one for my house.
customer_reviews.author: M Maes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Mother’s Day and it was the perfect gift. It comes with two so I left one in the bathroom and one in the living room. Although the flower is fake, it’s still a very pretty decor.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and presentation
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the guest bath and it looks awesome. I liked it so much I got one for my Mom. It's a great scent but not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Smells like dog shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: It's a hard pass for me. It's not the worst smell but when your house smells like a dog grooming salon somethings not quite right. On top of that, it doesn't last very long...maybe a month if that. I bought a cheaper reed diffuser from Home Goods prior to this and it lasted 4-5 months. I was expecting the same with this. For the price, anything would have been better than 1 month and a puppy grooming salon.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Callis

customer_reviews.title: Brighten Up Your Space
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little display and the delivery was perfect. A nice way to scent an area and provide some style as well
customer_reviews.author: D. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty diffuser. My only concern is the picture is prettier than the actual product, and it’s really small.
customer_reviews.author: Mama1215

customer_reviews.title: More perfume scent than a flower scent
customer_reviews.text: I don't dislike the scent, but it wasn't exactly what I was hoping for. Its hard to describe the smell as it has a strong alcohol scent that doesn't seem too natural as it smells more like a perfume than a flower smell. Only had it a few days, so can't comment on longevity just yet. Everyone has different preferences on what they like, so I would say UT's a 50/50 chance if you will like the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Filerpa

customer_reviews.title: Where to place these attractive containers,
customer_reviews.text: The presentation is as exactly as advertised, it’s attractive it comes with a little floral arrangement, the fragrance is good it is covers the rooms with it’s perfumed air.. I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. My husband is very sensitive to any strong scent, and this doesn't bother him at all. My bathroom smells so clean everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Nikki Olgado

customer_reviews.title: The scent is so lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! This made a really nice gift. The box it comes in is nice as well. I also ordered the scent refill and glad I did. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. Paul

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty and looks just like the picture. The scent is evident but not overbearing in a smaller size bathroom. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JBro

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Longevity isn’t all that. I need more Reed’s. Not sure how long the reeds last but it’s been two weeks (yes I flipped them) smells great tho. Stuck with vanilla scented things for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Biggs Gordon

customer_reviews.title: No flowers
customer_reviews.text: The description says the product comes with preserved flowers and a non-slip mat, both of which were reasons why I bought the product. My box included neither. Scent is decent, a little more candy-like than I usually prefer, but overall a decent scent.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I’m here for it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much I posted on my IG story lol. Smells fresh and looks cute!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissysoclassic

customer_reviews.title: Strong, yet refreshing scent that’s perfect for your bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to other reviewers, I think the smell is pretty strong, yet not so strong that it’s overwhelming! It’s a cute addition to my bathroom and I’ll definitely be buying another once the smell gets weaker — but it’s been about a month and it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Martinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase 😍
customer_reviews.text: I bought two black cherry 🍒 scented for gifts and to be honest I should definitely buy some for myself because they are so cute, and the packaging was great. Xoxoxo!
customer_reviews.author: Deviantashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. It smells good. But it doesn't last. I am at about a month and it's basically evaporated. Wahhh!
customer_reviews.author: MomLifeBusyWife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, long lasting scent with beautiful flowers
customer_reviews.text: This lasts for such a long time! I bought a refill, but I haven’t had to refill it yet. I think it’s been more than a month now. The flowers feel so real! I love the look and its color has still held true.
customer_reviews.author: Vesil Dao

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Had in my home, then moved to my office. Love it so much I may have to get another. Smell is perfect strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cocod'or Preserved Real Flower Reed Diffuser/Black Cherry / 6.7oz(200ml) / 1 Pack/Reed Diffuser Set, Oil Diffuser & Reed Diffuser Sticks, Home Decor & Office Decor, Fragrance and Gifts
feature_bullets: Black Cherry - Mixed with the sweetness of grape and apple for a sweet and mysterious scent unique to black cherry that brightens livens up the interior.

SAFETY - Our fragrances are free from formaldehyde, methanol, benzene, glyoxal, and cl dichloroethylene and adhere to IFRA standards and regulations. All of our diffuser bottles have completed safety tests. The number of reed sticks to match your taste. It takes 1 or 2 days for the fabric sticks to soak in the scent. When the fragrance weakens, simply turn the reed sticks upside down or replace them with new ones.

EASY SCENT CONTROL AND LONG-LASTING FRAGRANCE - Elegant glass bottle is 6.7 oz with reed sticks, real preserved flower included. You can choose to add or remove the number of reed sticks to match your taste. It takes 1 or 2 days for the fabric sticks to soak in the scent. When the fragrance weakens, simply turn the reed sticks upside down or replace them with new ones.

THOUGHTFUL GIFT IDEA - It is a thoughtful gift idea for weddings, birthdays, housewarming parties, Christmas, holidays, Mother’s day, and Father’s Day. Give joy to your parents, friends, colleagues, and customers with our luxurious Cocod’or diffusers.
100% SATISFACTION & 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE! TRY RISK FREE! - If you are not satisfied with your Diffuser please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to refund or replace your order asap
